data.title: Lithuania
data.meta_description: Covering an area of 65,300 km2, Lithuania is the largest of the three Baltic states, and the second poorest country in the EU. The population consists of some 3.5 million people, 80 per cent of whom are ethnic Lithuanians, 8.7 per cent ethnic Russians, 7 per cent...
